ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Short-break from EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, Baja ;)  Hey hey, dun get sexcited over me ;P Btw, is this mailing list only used by local/HK kakis (ie FF and DF) or used by all existing guild members
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, Baja ;) Hey hey, dun get sexcited over me ;P

Btw, is this mailing list only used by local/HK kakis (ie FF and DF) or
used by all existing guild members (ie includes pple like Leper, Lamik,
Higo etc)?

On Tuesday, 04 April, 2000 11:42 PM, Wilson [SMTP:ritzbits@...]
wrote:
> *drools*
> You on Baja right?
> *excited*
>
> Wilson
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> > Yeah, UO now have LOTS and LOTS of changes, giving players more
controls
> > over their chars (eg it's now possible to make 7gms char as u can
decide
> > which skills to lock, which to rise, which to drop etc).
> >
> > The new land is coming out, it's a mirror image of the existing land
but
> > pvp- (ie no pking). Everyone gonna have enuff place to put their
houses
> > (of coz in time to come, land will get scare again but this time they
> going
> > to implement 1 house per acct per shard).
> >
> > Lots of exciting changes now, plus a party system coming up. UO has
learn
> > alot from EQ and given the fact that it has more RP elements than EQ, I
> > believe it's gonna rock!
>
